|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3588; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A76 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 2.4 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.8 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit |bus2 = 64-bit
|flash1type = QSPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = XMC;25QU128CWIQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8125BG; |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8125BG; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 2.5GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe (M.2), USB 3.1 (Gen 1), USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 2.1, HDMI in, Micro SD Card slot, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, TP, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), microphone, IR receiver, RTC w/ battery, fan header, I2C, SPI, CAN, PWM, UART, GPIO |addchip = Low Power I2C RTC;AnalogTek;AT8563S;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio CODEC;Everest Semiconductor;ES8388;;1;,,, 2W Class-K Audio Amplifier;Awinic Technology;AW8733A;;1;,,, 4 Differential + 1 LVCMOS Output High Performance Buffer;Aurasemi;AU5426;;1;,,, PMIC;Rockchip;RK806-1;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 5/2023 |estprice = 109 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0C5C29F87 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OrangePi logo and "OPi5 PLUS V1.1" are on top of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3588 @2.4GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A76) :+ @1.8GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G610 MP4 (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.2); NPU Support 6T, :VPU (with 8K@60fps VP9 and 8K@30fps H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (QSPI NOR) Flash, TF card (max. 64GB) / : MMC card slot / eMMC Flash socket *Memory: 8GB (SDRAM) LPDDR4X *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (Type-C), 2x USB 2.0 ports *PCIe: 1x M.2 Key M (PCIe 3.0 x4), 1x M.2 Key E :(PCIe 2.0 x1 / PCM/UART / USB2.0) sockets *Network: 2x 2.5GbE ports *Power: 5V/4A via USB (Type-C)
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.orangepi.org/orangepiwiki/index.php/Orange_Pi_5_Plus ''Orange Pi 5 Plus'' on '''OrangePi''' Wiki] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/99-00-orange-pi-5-plus-sbc-is-now-available-to-order/ ''Orange Pi 5 Plus SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/05/10/orange-pi-5-plus-sbc-switches-to-rockchip-rk3588-soc-brings-dual-hdmi-2-1-dual-2-5gbe-m-2-pcie-sockets/ ''Orange Pi 5 Plus SBC switches to Rockchip RK3588 SoC'' on '''CNX-Software''']
